keyword: how many calories are in one crumbl cookie
title: How Many Calories Are in One Crumbl Cookie?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in one Crumbl cookie, plus detailed nutrition facts on carbs, protein, fat, sugars, and simple tweaks for different flavors.
h1: How Many Calories Are in One Crumbl Cookie?
assumptions: Standard Crumbl cookie (e.g., chocolate chip flavor), approximately 120g including frosting; baked fresh with typical ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, recipe changes, and bakery location. Check Crumbl's official site or packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard Crumbl cookie packs about 650 calories, with high carbs and sugars from the dough and frosting.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Crumbl cookie?
faqs.a: Approximately 650 calories for a standard flavor like chocolate chip.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Crumbl cookie?
faqs.a: About 80g carbs, 6g protein, 35g fat, with 50g sugars and 2g fiber.

faqs.q: Do different Crumbl flavors have varying calories?
faqs.a: Yes, flavors like peanut butter or brownie may range 600-700 kcal; check specifics.

faqs.q: Is a Crumbl cookie high in sodium?
faqs.a: Around 400mg sodium per cookie, mainly from dough ingredients and frosting.

faqs.q: How does Crumbl cookie size affect nutrition?
faqs.a: These are large cookies (~120g); smaller portions reduce calories proportionally.
